name: Getting Boxed
description:
Getting Boxed is about boxing up small box-like characters. Some of these characters will move at the same time and some of them will move the oposite direction. Its a fun little puzzle but given that it is made for a game jam i had limited time to make it and there is no more than 12 levels at the moment. 

Getting Boxed is made for the Dani's Basement Game Jam with the theme of "Linked together"
